name: ElasticComputeCloudSpotFleetSpotFleetRequestConfigDataLaunchSpecificationsBlockDeviceMappingsEbs
description: Ebs is a property of the Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud SpotFleet SpotFleetRequestConfigData LaunchSpecifications BlockDeviceMappings property that defines a block device for an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume.

properties.name: DeleteOnTermination
properties.description: Indicates whether to delete the volume when the instance is terminated.

properties.name: Encrypted
properties.description: Indicates whether the EBS volume is encrypted. Encrypted Amazon EBS volumes can be attached only to instances that support Amazon EBS encryption.

properties.name: Iops
properties.description: The number of I/O operations per second (IOPS) that the volume supports. For more information, see Iops for the EbsBlockDevice action in the Amazon EC2 API Reference.

properties.name: SnapshotId
properties.description: The snapshot ID of the volume that you want to use.

properties.name: VolumeSize
properties.description: The volume size, in Gibibytes (GiB). For more information about specifying the volume size, see VolumeSize for the EbsBlockDevice action in the Amazon EC2 API Reference.

properties.name: VolumeType
properties.description: The volume type. For more information about specifying the volume type, see VolumeType for the EbsBlockDevice action in the Amazon EC2 API Reference.
